Buttons

Inline buttons

<a> tags styled as buttons.

Pink inline button Purple inline button Teal inline button Orange inline button Green inline button

<input type="submit"> tags styled as buttons.

<input type="button"> tags styled as buttons.

<button> tags styled as buttons.

Block buttons

<a> tags styled as buttons.

Pink block button

Purple block button

Teal block button

Orange block button

Green block button

<input type="button"> tags styled as buttons.

<button> tags styled as buttons.

Ghost buttons

Inline ghost buttons. One of each tag (<a>, <input type="submit">, <input type="button">, <button>)

Pink inline ghost button

Block ghost buttons. One of each tag (<a>, <input type="submit">, <input type="button">, <button>)
